meanings.definition: To wear out or exhaust through excessive use.
meanings.sent1: She was overwearing her favorite shoes by wearing them every day.
meanings.sent2: The old bicycle was overwearing after being ridden for miles every day.
meanings.sent3: He joked that he was overwearing his patience by waiting in line for so long.
meanings.sent4: The constant stress was overwearing her like a relentless storm.
meanings.sent5: The repetitive motion of typing was slowly overwearing the keyboard keys.

meanings.definition: Worn out or exhausted from excessive use.
meanings.sent1: The overwearing shoes had holes in the soles from constant use.
meanings.sent2: The overwearing backpack was falling apart at the seams.
meanings.sent3: The overwearing phone battery died quickly due to its age.
meanings.sent4: Her overwearing enthusiasm for the project was starting to fade.
meanings.sent5: The overwearing carpet showed signs of fraying along the edges.
